## Lines in `ggplot2`

::: {style="color: #043b67;"}
#### Geoms for areas:
:::
  
```{r}
#| label: play_with_lines
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| out-height: '55%'
#| out-width: '55%'
#| fig-align: right
library(palmerpenguins) 
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
economics <- ggplot2::economics
seals <- ggplot2::seals
df <- data.frame(x = 1:5, y = c(5, 1, 4, 2, 7))
# geom_ribbon ----
ggp2_ribbon_base <- ggplot2::ggplot(data = df,
    mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    xlim(0.5, 5.5) +
    ylim(0, 10)
rbn <- ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(aes(xmin = x, ymin = y,
                xmax = x + 1, ymax = y + 1)) +
    theme_void() + 
    labs(title = "geom_ribbon()")
# geom_polygon ----
ggp2_line_base <- ggplot(data = economics, 
    aes(x = date, y = unemploy))
plygn <- ggp2_line_base + 
    geom_polygon() + 
    theme_void() + 
    labs(title = "geom_polygon()")
# geom_rect ----
ggp2_rect_base <- ggplot2::ggplot(data = df,
    mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    xlim(0.5, 5.5) +
    ylim(0, 10)
rct <- ggp2_rect_base + 
    geom_rect(aes(xmin = x, ymin = y,
                xmax = x + 1, ymax = y + 1)) +
    theme_void() + 
    labs(title = "geom_rect()")
plygn + rct + rbn + 
    patchwork::plot_layout(ncol = 1)
```

  - **`geom_ribbon()`**
  
  - `geom_polygon()`

## `geom_ribbon()`

:::: {.panel-tabset}

### Basic Use

::: {style="font-size: 1.15em; color: #1e83c8;"}
**BASICS:**
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: basic_ribbon
#| eval: true
#| echo: true 
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| column: page-inset-right
#| out-height: '100%'
#| out-width: '100%'
ggp2_ribbon_base <- ggplot(data = economics,
                        mapping = aes(x = date))
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = 
            aes(y = uempmed, 
                ymin = uempmed + 0.5, 
                ymax = uempmed - 0.5))
```

:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.85em;"}

The required aesthetics are: 

  - `x` or `y` positions  
  
  - `ymin` or `ymax`  
  
  - `xmin` or `xmax`  
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: aes_ribbon
#| eval: true
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| code-fold: show
#| column: page-inset-right
#| out-height: '100%'
#| out-width: '100%'
# map corr_data
ggp2_ribbon_base <- ggplot(data = corr_data)
# map x, y, ymin and ymax, and +/- adjustment
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(x = xvar,
                    y = yvar,
                    ymin = yvar - 0.667, 
                    ymax = yvar + 0.667))
```
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.85em;"}
Optional aesthetics include: 

`alpha`

`color`

`fill`

`group`

`linetype`

`linewidth`

:::

#### `alpha`

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: aes_alpha_ribbon
#| eval: true
#| echo: true 
#| code-fold: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| column: page-inset-right
#| out-height: '100%'
#| out-width: '100%'
#| layout-ncol: 2
# adjustment
adj <- sd(corr_data$xvar)
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(
        x = xvar, y = yvar,
        ymin = yvar - adj, ymax = yvar + adj), 
        alpha = 1/3) +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#ffffff") +
    labs(subtitle = "alpha = 1/3")
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(
        x = xvar, y = yvar,
        ymin = yvar - adj, ymax = yvar + adj), 
        alpha = 1/2) +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#ffffff") +
    labs(subtitle = "alpha = 1/2")
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(
        x = xvar, y = yvar,
        ymin = yvar - adj, ymax = yvar + adj),
        alpha = 3/4) +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#ffffff") + 
    labs(subtitle = "alpha = 3/4")
```
:::

#### `color`

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: aes_color_ribbon
#| eval: true
#| echo: true 
#| code-fold: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| column: page-inset-right
#| out-height: '100%'
#| out-width: '100%'
#| layout-ncol: 2
# adjustment
adj <- sd(corr_data$xvar)
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(
        x = xvar, y = yvar,
        ymin = yvar - adj, ymax = yvar + adj), 
        color = "#fa7b3c") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#ffffff") +
    labs(subtitle = "geom_ribbon(color = '#fa7b3c'), geom_line(color = '#ffffff')")
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(
        x = xvar, y = yvar,
        ymin = yvar - adj, ymax = yvar + adj),
        color = "#007bff") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#89D6FB") + 
    labs(subtitle = "geom_ribbon(color = '#007bff'), geom_line(color = '#89D6FB')")
```
:::

#### `fill`

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: aes_fill_ribbon
#| eval: true
#| echo: true 
#| code-fold: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| column: page-inset-right
#| out-height: '100%'
#| out-width: '100%'
#| layout-ncol: 2
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(x = xvar,
                    y = yvar,
                    ymin = min(yvar) - 1, 
                    ymax = yvar - 0.75),
        fill = "#0bd3d3") + 
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#9d40f5", linewidth = 1) + 
    labs(subtitle = "ymin = min(yvar) - 1 , ymax = yvar - 0.75")
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(x = xvar,
                    y = yvar,
                    ymin = yvar + 0.75, 
                    ymax = max(yvar) + 1), 
        fill = "#f890e7") + 
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#9d40f5", linewidth = 1) + 
    labs(subtitle = "ymin = yvar + 0.75 , ymax = max(yvar) + 1")
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(x = xvar,
                    y = yvar,
                    ymin = min(yvar) - 1, 
                    ymax = yvar - 0.75),
        fill = "#0bd3d3") + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(x = xvar,
                    y = yvar,
                    ymin = yvar + 0.75, 
                    ymax = max(yvar) + 1), 
        fill = "#f890e7") + 
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#9d40f5", linewidth = 1) + 
    labs(subtitle = "ymin = min(yvar) - 1 , ymax = yvar - 0.75\nymin = yvar + 0.75 / ymax = max(yvar) + 1")
```
:::

### Additional Arguments

::: {style="font-size: 1.15em; color: #1e83c8;"}
**ARGUMENTS:**
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: args_1_ribbon
#| eval: true
#| echo: true 
#| code-fold: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| column: page-inset-right
#| out-height: '100%'
#| out-width: '100%'
#| layout-ncol: 2
# adjustment
adj <- sd(corr_data$xvar)
# line only
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#9d40f5") + 
    labs(subtitle = "geom_line()")
ggp2_ribbon_base + 
    geom_ribbon(mapping = aes(
        x = xvar, y = yvar,
        xmin = xvar - adj, xmax = xvar + adj),
        fill = "#89D6FB") +
    geom_line(mapping = aes(x = xvar, y = yvar),
        color = "#9d40f5", orientation = "y") + 
    labs(subtitle = "xmin, xmin & orientation = 'y'")
```
